title: Strategies to Enhance Teaching Presence in Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Developing strategies for establishing effective teaching presence in online environments for pre-service science teachers and job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three dimensions of teaching presence (instructional design, interaction facilitation, direct instruction) in online science classes.
Learners can apply at least two strategies for interaction facilitation in actual Zoom-based classes.
Learners can suggest differentiated teaching presence strategies based on learner characteristics (gender, major).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
